title: Trump’s Unilateral Iran Strike Sparks Constitutional War Powers Dispute
summary_full: Critics say the president is violating the Constitution, and many Democrats and at least two Republicans in Congress say they must vote on whether to enter such a conflict.
summary_public: Critics say the president is violating the Constitution, and many Democrats and at least two Republicans in Congress say they must vote on whether to enter such a conflict.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump’s Unilateral Iran Strike Sparks Constitutional War Powers Dispute
